Q45: All national guidelines exist but implementation could be improved. Please specify where and how 
implementation of national guidelines could be improved:
 1  Appropriate food-based dietary guidance for women in the pre-pregnancy period: ___________
 2   Appropriate food-based dietary guidance for women during pregnancy:  ___________
 3  Appropriate food-based dietary guidance for the postpartum period:  ____________
 4   Appropriate physical activity for women during pregnancy
